Package smarthome.service.impl

Class ReadingServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
smarthome.service.impl.ReadingServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IReadingService
@Service public class ReadingServiceImpl extends Object implements IReadingService
This class represents a service for readings.

      Returns the maximum temperature difference between two devices in a given period.
      Specified by:
      getMaxInstantTemperatureDifferenceInAGivenPeriod in interface IReadingService
      Parameters:
      deviceId1 - The id of the first device.
      deviceId2 - The id of the second device.
      startTime - The start time of the period.
      endTime - The end time of the period.
      Returns:
      The maximum temperature difference between the two devices in the given period or null if the parameters are invalid.
